application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Diseased Red Horse Chestnut (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately: 9.00m: Cut down to ground level. This tree is in decline, has bark loss, Basel decay and is situated in a large shrub bed area close to an access path and Tennis courts.1 x Cherry Laurel (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce up to 1.50m to shape. Control encroachment/ General maintenance.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 3.25m:  Tidy Holly to a 2.00m: Reduce by approximately 1.25m to tidy and improve site lines. General maintenance.1 x Mature Lime (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 18m: Located to the back of No.32 centrally: 1 low limb  approximately 4.00m from ground level which grows across the path and over Tennis court by approximately 2.00m to clear tennis court. Control encroachment.
